unnormalised: Arre yaar, mhoje taxes bhortana hamesha drama zata! Tankam mhozo PAN card number zai, mhozo GSTIN, ani mhozo bloody TAN number! Tem mhaka lagta, Income Tax dept thand rav, hanv fakt mhoje nagri kartavya korunchea prayatnank asa, rocket launch korunk nhoi. Uprant tankam mhozo Aadhar number zai astolo, mhojem driving license, ani mhoje pressure cooker-ache serial number. He rate-an, 31/07 poryant, hanv fakt mhojem nav bodli korun Goeam yetolo. BTW, konnak khobor asa Goa-ak shack-ak GSTIN zai asa? Eka ixttak vichartan!
normalised: Arre yaar, mhoje taxes bhortana maka sodanch drama dista! Tankam mhojem P-A-N card number zai, mhojem G-S-T-I-N, ani mhojem bloody T-A-N number! Tem mhunnllear, chill, Income Tax department, hanv fokot mhojem nagri kartovya koruncho yotn kortam, rocket launch korunk nhoi. Fuddem tankam mhaka mhojem Aadhar number, mhojem driving license, ani mhojea pressure cookeracho serial number zai poddta. Hea dharan, thirty first july porian, hanv fokot mhojem nanv bodlunk Goeam vetolom. By the way, konnak tori khobor asa Goa-k shack-ak G-S-T-I-N zai poddta kai? Eka ixttak vichartam!
text: Arre yaar, mhoje taxes bhortana hamesha drama zata! Tankam mhozo PAN card number zai, mhozo GSTIN, ani mhozo bloody TAN number! Tem mhaka lagta, Income Tax dept thand rav, hanv fakt mhoje nagri kartavya korunchea prayatnank asa, rocket launch korunk nhoi. Uprant tankam mhozo Aadhar number zai astolo, mhojem driving license, ani mhoje pressure cooker-ache serial number. He rate-an, 31/07 poryant, hanv fakt mhojem nav bodli korun Goeam yetolo. BTW, konnak khobor asa Goa-ak shack-ak GSTIN zai asa? Eka ixttak vichartan!
